price: Dájúdájú àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí wọ́n sì ṣe àwọn iṣẹ́ rere, ẹ̀san tí kò níí pẹ̀dín tí kò níí dáwọ́ dúró ń bẹ fún wọn.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
